comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: He does look well and it is nice to put a face to a name.  Obviously he and the wife made a good combination.  That is a very historic chain around his neck, a symbol of British rank and station yet one that should be treasured for the connections with our country down the centuries!  TO ALL OUR FLICKR COMMUNITY - I JUST SAW OUR CAROL ON THE RADIO talking about this photostream!
